content:
I apologize for any confusion or frustration caused by the previous examples. I understand that ASCII art can be subjective, but I acknowledge that the previous examples may not have been suitable for your needs.

Here is another example of an ASCII art heart that should more closely resemble the shape of a heart:
```python
,#####,
```
#\_ \_#
|aa|
| u |
\ = /
\_\_\_/

I hope this example meets your expectations. If you have any further requests or specifications for the ASCII art heart, please let me know and I will do my best to accommodate your needs.
